markdownRemark.html:
Chasing the impossible creates opportunities.

The pursuit of impossible dreams allowed curiosity to evolve to reality thus creating the world we live in today..

What did I did learn the following doing the same?

  • Discovered my fascination on a bunch of topics like culture, history, economy, ecology, climate science, philosophy… basically I wanted to know more about how the world works.. universal truths.
  • Money is one of the most powerful inventions ever made. Possibly bigger than the internet. It allowed the birth of quantifiable measurements to any concept there is the human mind can think of..Even humans most of the time is measured by the amount of money they have in the bank..
  • We all came from stardust. Yes, we - all the things your eyes can capture came from a dead star about 4.657 billion years ago.
  • The ability of modern science to unravel the truths. From how our brain works to how electricity is being created and gets transferred to your smartphone..yes science knows it.
  • Our brain is a poor tool for success and a great tool for survival.
  • Television and smartphones are the worst timewasters.
  • Opinions and decisions change in the light of new information. It is best to let go of unproductive pursuits the fastest time possible.

Fear and pursuit of comfort have killed too much dreams, probably more than all the deaths caused by wars and epidemics combined..
